articles.author: Matt Discombe
articles.title: NHSE rows with royal college over 'unhelpful' virtual ward targets - Health Service Journal
articles.description: NHS England’s virtual wards target is leading to some lower risk patients being ‘over-monitored’ in pursuit of a headline ambition ahead of winter, a leading royal college has told HSJ.

articles.title: S&P drops ESG scores from debt ratings amid scrutiny - Financial Times
articles.description: Agency will no longer rank companies’ environmental, social and governance risks from 1 to 5
articles.content:
S&P Global has stopped handing out scores to corporate borrowers on ESG criteria, at a time of rising questions about their utility and political attacks on such metrics.
